afterSuccessStateExplanation: Your unstaked ORBS will be available after the unfreezing period.
unstakingSubStep_message_selectAmountOfO: Select amount of ORBS to unstake
unstakingSubStep_stepExplanation: This will take your ORBS out of their staked state and start a 21-day cooldown period, after which you'll be able to withdraw them to your wallet. During those 21 days, you may choose to re-stake your tokens.
unstakingSubStep_warning_thereAreOrbsInC: Unstaking more tokens now will reset the cooldown timer to 30 days for the entire sum.
Warning: There are currently tokens in cooldown.
